locations.name: Still Platform (Water World)

setting.scale: intimate, enclosed yet open to vertical space above and below
setting.architecture: Futuristic structures softened by water physics. Smooth curved surfaces, semi-translucent walls, organic geometries. Platform is small and stable—the only solid ground in a suspended reality.
setting.timeOfDay: timeless, perpetual dim twilight with no sun or moon visible

atmosphere.lighting: Dim ambient glow from refracted light sources within the water. Soft caustic patterns on surfaces. Gentle luminescence from architectural elements. No harsh light.
atmosphere.weather: Submerged environment—slow-moving particles (motes, bubbles, dust-like elements) drift through space. Gentle currents visible in particle movement.
atmosphere.mood: Calm, dim, quietly oppressive yet strangely safe. Time feels slow and heavy.

visualAnchors: Slow-moving luminous particles drifting through water space
Caustic light refractions rippling across walls and floor
Semi-translucent architectural surfaces with soft inner glow
Floating fabric, hair, and debris moving as if underwater
Small stable platform with smooth curved edges as the only solid ground

soundscape.ambient: Deep submerged resonance, muffled low frequencies, distant metallic tones
soundscape.signature: Slow rhythmic pulse like a heartbeat transmitted through water

locations.notes: Her starting and ending location. Used for early stillness (Act I) and final reach pose (Act IV). The platform represents her one point of stability in a world that resists movement.

locations.name: Corridor of Currents (Water World)

setting.type: suspended corridor with visible water flow
setting.scale: narrow and linear, creating a sense of path and direction
setting.architecture: Long passage between floating structures. Walls are semi-open with gaps where water currents are visible. Floor is uneven or partially absent. Architectural ribbing creates a skeletal tunnel effect.

atmosphere.lighting: Directional light filtering through gaps in the corridor structure. Light shifts as currents move, creating animated caustic patterns. Brighter than the Still Platform but still subdued.
atmosphere.weather: Active water currents visible as streams of particles and displaced debris. Ribbons of light and shadow shift with flow. Hair and fabric pulled by current direction.
colorPalette: dark blue shadows between structural ribs
atmosphere.mood: Transitional, testing, uncomfortable. The space demands movement but resists it.

visualAnchors: Visible water currents shown as streams of particles flowing in specific directions
Architectural ribbing creating a skeletal tunnel frame
Gaps in walls where light and current break through
Fabric and hair pulled by directional water flow
Uneven or partially absent floor requiring careful navigation

soundscape.ambient: Flowing water pressure, structural groans, current whistle through gaps
soundscape.signature: Rushing current sound that intensifies with flow direction

locations.notes: Where she attempts her first movements (Act II) and learns to work with currents. Visual emphasis on the contrast between her awkward movement and the elegant flow of the environment.

locations.name: Open Chamber (Water World)

setting.type: large open suspended space within the water sanctuary
setting.scale: expansive, open, liberating compared to earlier spaces
setting.architecture: Vast chamber with distant curved walls and high ceiling lost in darkness above. Multiple floating platforms at different heights. Open water space between structures allows free movement.
setting.timeOfDay: timeless, but brighter than other water locations—suggests progression

atmosphere.lighting: Multiple soft light sources from different directions. Richer caustic patterns. Bioluminescent elements in the architecture provide warm accents. More depth and dimension than earlier locations.
atmosphere.weather: Gentle omnidirectional currents. Particles drift in complex patterns. The water feels supportive rather than resistant.
atmosphere.mood: Open, progressive, cautiously hopeful. The space feels like achievement.

visualAnchors: Vast open water space with multiple floating platforms at varying heights
Bioluminescent architectural elements providing warm golden accents
Complex particle patterns in open water showing multiple gentle currents
Distant curved walls lost in atmospheric depth
Light ribbons tracing through the open space

soundscape.ambient: Open resonance, harmonic water tones, distant structural music
soundscape.signature: Gentle chime-like quality of light interacting with water particles

locations.notes: Act IV location where she moves more confidently. Represents progression—larger, more forgiving space. She has learned to travel by working with currents.

locations.name: Initial Landing Zone (Volcanic World)

setting.type: broken platform floating over molten energy
setting.architecture: Fractured remains of a futuristic city. A single large platform fragment with exposed structural interior, broken edges, cracks glowing with molten energy. Debris orbits slowly. Below: visible lava/molten energy field.
setting.timeOfDay: perpetual volcanic twilight, orange-red ambient from below, dark sky above

atmosphere.lighting: Strong uplight from molten energy below casting orange-red glow upward. Dark sky above with ember particles. High contrast between hot underlight and dark overcast. Heat haze distortion visible at edges.
atmosphere.weather: Ash particles falling slowly. Heat shimmer distorting air above lava. Occasional ember sparks rising from below. Hot, dry, oppressive.
colorPalette: dark charcoal black of broken structures
ember yellow-white in cracks and sparks
atmosphere.mood: Hot, unstable, overwhelming, demanding immediate action.

visualAnchors: Glowing molten cracks running through the broken platform surface
Molten energy field visible below through gaps and broken edges
Fractured futuristic architecture with exposed internal structure
Slowly orbiting debris fragments around the main platform
Heat haze distortion at platform edges and above lava

soundscape.ambient: Deep rumbling, cracking rock, hissing heat, distant structural collapse
soundscape.signature: Low bass rumble of molten energy pulsing beneath

locations.notes: Where he first arrives (Act I) in a defensive fighting stance. Establishes the hostile, unstable nature of his world. Must feel dangerous from the first frame.

locations.name: Battle Spine (Volcanic World)

setting.type: network of bridges, staircases, and narrow paths across lava
setting.scale: long and linear with dangerous depth below, claustrophobic width
setting.architecture: Interconnected fragments of destroyed city infrastructure—bridges that end abruptly, staircases to nowhere, narrow walkways between larger platforms. Everything floats over molten energy. Structural elements shift and collapse unpredictably.

atmosphere.lighting: Strong directional uplight from lava below. Side-lighting from glowing structural cracks. Flickering light from falling debris and shifting platforms. Dynamic, unstable lighting.
atmosphere.weather: Active environment: falling debris, shifting platforms, rising heat. Ash and ember particles dense in the air. Occasional volcanic flare-ups from below.
atmosphere.mood: Intense, combat-ready, escalating danger. The arena of his fight.

visualAnchors: Narrow bridges and walkways spanning gaps over molten energy
Platforms that shift, crack, or collapse during action
Dense ash and ember particle field in the air
Staircases and paths that end abruptly at broken edges
Glowing structural cracks spreading through architecture

soundscape.ambient: Cracking stone, metal stress, falling debris impacts, lava bubbling
soundscape.signature: Sharp crack of platform splitting during combat

locations.notes: Primary combat location (Acts II and III). Designed for martial arts sequences. The environment itself is a combatant—platforms collapse, gaps widen, heat intensifies. Enemies emerge as environmental constructs: shapes of rock, molten fragments, energy. Fights are intense but elegant.

locations.name: High Edge / Lookout (Volcanic World)

setting.type: elevated fractured platform overlooking the volcanic expanse
setting.scale: elevated, exposed, panoramic view of destruction below
setting.architecture: The highest remaining fragment of the destroyed city. A single platform jutting out over the void. Structural remnants of a former tower or observation point. Broken and isolated, nothing beyond its edge.

atmosphere.lighting: Uplight from distant lava creates warm glow on platform underside. Sky above dark with drifting ember particles. Character backlit by volcanic glow when facing outward. Dramatic rim lighting from below.
atmosphere.weather: High altitude: less ash, clearer air but visible heat distortion. Wind suggested by fabric movement. Ember particles sparse but visible against dark sky.
colorPalette: distant ember orange scattered in air
atmosphere.mood: Elevated, contemplative, resolute. A pause in the storm.

visualAnchors: Single platform edge jutting into void with nothing beyond
Panoramic view of volcanic destruction below and behind
Dramatic uplight creating rim glow on platform underside
Heat distortion warping the air at the platform edge
Structural remnants of a former tower or observation point

soundscape.ambient: High wind, distant rumbling, occasional deep boom from below

locations.notes: Used for pause moments (Act III) and the final reach shot (Act IV). Where his relationship to fighting shifts from domination to navigation. Final shot: extending one hand forward toward edge of frame, heat distorting the air, matching her pose in the water world.
